title: The Importance of Contact Tracing and Testing
itunes:title: The Importance of Contact Tracing and Testing
description:
Dr. Bruce Farber, Chief of Infectious Diseases at Northwell Health, provides a coronavirus update as restrictions in some states start to ease. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek P&I Reporter Devin Leonard discuss small-business owners saying PPP isn’t the solution they need. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne talks about his column on President Trump “trying to open Pandora’s box.” And we Drive to the Close with Kathy Boyle, President at Chaplin Hill Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
